functions.name: FACTCHECK
functions.description: Fact-checks a claim using Claude AI. Returns VERIFIED, NOT_VERIFIED, or INCONCLUSIVE.

parameters.name: whatItIs
parameters.description: Context: entity, timeframe, or metric definition.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Domain (e.g. cdc.gov) or full URL. Blank = general knowledge.

parameters.name: refreshHours
parameters.description: Cache TTL in hours. Default 24. Set 0 to always call the API.
